publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2403 Allan Wilson:The Draft Renewables Obligation ( Scotland) Order 2005—That the Enterprise and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Renewables Obligation ( Scotland) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace*

S2M-2403 Allan Wilson:The Draft Renewables Obligation ( Scotland) Order 2005—That the Enterprise and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Renewables Obligation ( Scotland) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace
